posts.post_content:
As the title says. I'm looking for beat up OJs, skinned and trimmed is fine. Looking for a few in the $40-$50 price range.

Pm me if you have anything, thanks!

Thanks Travis... Got the OJs and they are great!

If anyone else has some real beaters, i'm interested if the price is right!

Thanks guys for the PMs!

I have picked up some of the best beater at great prices!  I'm still looking so keep sending me PMs
